title: Biden Still Listening To Science? Is Disney Being Deceptive? 12.11.20
itunes:title: Biden Still Listening To Science? Is Disney Being Deceptive? 12.11.20
description:
In episode 777, Miles and guest host Jamie Loftus are joined by comedian Katia Kvinge to discuss the Biden administration disinfecting the White House before moving in, Joe Biden not following the science, the covid vacationers, Disney World increasing park capacity, the State Department throwing a party, and more!

FOOTNOTES:

  1. Biden To Have Entire WH East And West Wings Showered With Disinfectant Right After Trump Leaves
  2. Joe Biden Said He’d “Follow the Science” on the Pandemic. He Isn’t.
  3. The Jet-Setters Scheming to Break All the COVID Rules
  4. Disney World increases park capacity to 35% as coronavirus cases increase across the country
  5. Disney World Hits Capacity at All Four Parks Today
  6. PHOTO: Walt Disney World Now Placing Digital Face Masks Over Maskless Guests in On-Ride Photos
  7. Walt Disney World's Florida Problem
  8. At Disney World, ‘Worst Fears’ About Virus Have Not Come True
  9. Dismissing health concerns, State Department treats 200 guests to holiday drinks, tours and leftover ‘Be Best’ swag
  10. WATCH: Shamana - Soundcloud

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
